string.value: When I entered a lab full of #o6110301#, I heard a strange voice somewhere inside... this is not good.
Following along the deep, mature voice, I found myself having accrossed the #bstrange #o6110301##k.
A strange #o6110301#... Apparently it's the alchemist that worked here before, called #p2111006#. What? Does that mean he's... a ghost! For a ghost, he certainly does not seem intimidating...
...who's there? I can tell you're here. I don't know who you are, but please come help me...
Nice to meet you... I am #p2111006#, a researcher in this lab... Hmm... why are you looking at me like that? You look like you've just witnessed something horrific...
Anyway it's so good to encounter someone here. It's been a long time since I last talked to a person. I wonder what's wrong with the alchemists these days... they just never drop by the lab.

Why did I call you? Well... Hmm... I actually just called you because it was so good to see someone here. Hahahaha... there's actually nothing that I need from you. I just felt like talking for once... hahaha!
